title: What type of blog posts are easy to write? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear, Sanjeev You can write any type of post you would be like to write, the easiest type of blog post is “List Post”. In list post, you just complied very easily as compare to other types of a blog post.  List types of blog posts are quicky make and this creates a Curiosity to the user. Even I am also using List type blog posts in my DigitalMarketing blog. Here I give you some examples:-> 11 Weight loss tips for women27 Seo tips for beginners9 Creative Painting tips for painters7 Travel tips for travellersLike that, so many lists are there, only the niche changed and industry change, left is same. BEST OF LUCK Before you go, I’d like to say “thank you” for reading this article. So a big thanks for reading all the way to the end. Now I’d like to ask for a *small* favour. Could you please take a minute or two and SHARE IT With Your Friends & Help Someone... This feedback will help me continue to write the kind of articles that help you get results. And if you loved it, then please let me know… If you have any questions? Let me hear your thoughts in the comments below! THANKS!MURLI

I think that the easiest type of blog to write is a personal diary type. The content is bound to be unique to you and no research is needed apart from a little background information occasionally. Of course, there’s no guarantee that anyone will want to read it! Here’s mine: Eclectic Anecdotes
